entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023
